name: saveloy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of spicy smoked sausage made with pork (= meat from a pig): I have not eaten a saveloy for a long time. Saveloys and sausage rolls are always popular if you need to provide food for a party.
More examplesFewer examplesI could never understand why saveloys were so popular.We went into a chip shop and asked for two saveloys and a fish cake.We celebrated our win at the dog races with a meal of saveloy and chips.
